meanings.definition: Designed to prevent slipping or sliding.
meanings.sent1: The skidproof shoes kept him safe on the icy sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The skidproof surface of the playground equipment ensured the children's safety.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her skidproof socks made her the champion of the slippery floor race.
meanings.sent4: The skidproof coating on the stairs was like having invisible magnets keeping him steady.
meanings.sent5: The skidproof gloves gave him confidence while working on the oil-slicked engine.

meanings.definition: To make something resistant to skidding or slipping.
meanings.sent1: He skidproofed the driveway by adding gravel to prevent accidents.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic skidproofs the brake pads to ensure better traction on wet roads.
meanings.sent3: She decided to skidproof her phone by putting a rubber case on it.
meanings.sent4: The chef skidproofed the cutting board by placing a damp cloth underneath.
meanings.sent5: The hiker skidproofed his boots with special grips for the rocky terrain.
